first_para: Liam McLaughlan (born 21 March 1996) is a Scottish political activist. He is a prominent member of the Scottish Socialist Party and was an active youth campaigner ahead of the 2014 Scottish independence referendum.

full.extract: Liam McLaughlan (born 21 March 1996) is a Scottish political activist. He is a prominent member of the Scottish Socialist Party and was an active youth campaigner ahead of the 2014 Scottish independence referendum.
full.title: Liam McLaughlan
